SQLLoaderMapping.name: Eco boundaries
SQLLoaderMapping.fetch_sql:
SELECT e.name AS EcoBoundaryName
            FROM eco_boundary e
SQLLoaderMapping.load_sql:
INSERT INTO eco_boundary (
                eco_region_id,
                name)
            SELECT
                er.id,
                @EcoBoundaryName AS name
            FROM eco_region er
            WHERE er.name = @EcoBoundaryName
